PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12842018-10-17,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of CHARLES STANLEY SULLIVAN of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and his designation as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, effective October 27, 2018.
